title: AE插件/预设：图形动画+文字动画Animation Composer 2.1.1 Win/Mac 免费版
author: 大众脸
content: Animation Composer 是由 MisterHorse（马头人大师）开发的一款优秀 After Effects 插件，专为图形动画与文字动画设计。该插件可便捷地使用数千种预设，适用于转场、特效及 MG 动画制作。插件界面简洁直观，支持直接预览每个独立效果，并能高效管理预设资源。

other.notes: 分享的是免费版，包含部分预设，不含付费内容；正版价格较高且在线安装需注册。
other.installation_tip: 安装后在 After Effects 的 Window（窗口）菜单中可找到插件。

2.1.1: Added support for paths (masks, shapes) to Keyframe Wingman
Fixed several bugs that were causing crashes when using Keyframe Wingman
2.1.0: Added option to change Precomp’s duration before inserting it
Added option to insert Precomp at playhead at its In Point or at the end of its In Transition
Added clear button to search bar
Added option to reveal freshly installed items
2.0.6: Fix an issue that caused crash when using Anchor Point tool
Fix an issue that caused the plugin to not load when After Effects was started through Adobe Premiere
Add back the possibility to search for preset with its unique code
2.0.5: Prevented crash in buggy AE CS6 version (“Update required” warning)
Fixed crash on changing Precomp duration
2.0.4: Added option to edit “Duration with transition” directly in UI
Fixed error occuring during inserting a new Precomp
2.0.3: Fix Free Starter Pack download button
2.0.2: Fixed Precomp editing issue in large project files
Fixed some UI glitches in Manage Products window
2.0.1: Fixed Update button in Manage Products
2.0.0: New type of content called “Precomps” (royalty-free titles, animated illustrations, elements, etc.)
New user guide with short tutorial videos
User accounts for syncing favorites and licenses
New “Manage Products” window for downloading/updating content
Ability to apply multiple presets to one layer
New presets in “The Most Handy Presets Pack”
